mapper.insert: insert into general_users(email, passwd, name, postal_code, address1, address2, tel1, tel2, tel3, register_date) values(#{email}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{postal_code}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, current_timestamp);
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (select email from general_users union select email from company_users) as gcunion WHERE email = #{email}
select * from general_users where email = #{email} and exit_reason is null;
